docs.text: the premise of this movie is , well , pretty far-fetched .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: tom berenger plays shale , a mercenary who is temporarily out of work ( those fools at the cia have denied his existence just because he and his buddies botched a job in cuba ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: fortunately , his girl friend ( diane venora ) , a teacher at christopher columbus high school in miami , gets her knee cap broken by a disgruntled student , creating a job opening for shale as a substitute teacher .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: not telling his girl friend , who might object on pedagogical grounds , he creates a number of fake higher degrees for himself ( from yale , harvard , princeton , et al ) and begins his tenure as a high school teacher .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the students ( junkies , drug dealers , gang members , sleazy sluts , ice-pick wielders . . . you
docs.label: negative

docs.text: get the picture ) don't really take to him right away , so he hits one in the face with a can and breaks a few fingers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this gets their attention to a certain extent , so he tells them the story of the vietnam war : " see , some homeboys from the north tried to muscle in on the turf of the homeboys from the south . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: oh yeah , now they can dig it ; the problem is just that nobody ever explained it properly before .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but wait !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there are drugs being dealt in the school itself !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and behind the whole scheme , in cahoots with the head gang , the kod ( no , not " cod " , but " knights of destruction " . . . really ! ) , is none other than . . . the
docs.label: negative

docs.text: upright , ex-cop principal , played by the forgotten ghostbuster , ernie hudson !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: so shale does what any good teacher would do .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he gets his buddies together , they gather together a bunch of bazookas and other major weapons , explosives , and cool stuff like that , and they have a big showdown against the drug dealers and kod at the high school .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ok , so the premise is not just far-fetched , it's downright dumb .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if this were a hong kong action comedy , we might just accept it , but it takes itself far too seriously to be truly fun .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: oh , it has its moments ; how one can truly hate a movie in which huge ( really huge ) amounts of cocaine are delivered in school busses ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and to be fair , it is almost never really boring , as the action is interrupted by only short sequences of actual story .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but over all , this is pretty much a made-for-tv movie with more ( and bigger ) explosions and more foul language .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in fact , it reminded me of " miami vice " without the production values , babes in skimpy bikinis , and pastels .
docs.label: negative
